website_summaries.verdict: An outdoor, oil-free fryer powered by electricity. Though it has some limitations, it's a good pick for budget-conscious consumers.
pros: Cooks without oil, and accommodates turkeys up to 18 lbs
On the lower end of the price range
cons: Cooking time is twice that of a traditional oil fryer, which is unacceptable for some consumers

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: In AZ we do everything we can to cook outside to not heat up the house with the oven. A regular turkey fryer is too messy, and the oil is not only bad for you but costs $$. Now with this thing we have the best of both worlds. Turkey cooks fast and tastes better than ever with no mess. This cooker is a no brainer in my opinion. It does a lot more than just turkeys too. Only wish I found it years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R.

customer_reviews.title: I've made many deep fried turkeys with peanut oil but ...
customer_reviews.text: I've made many deep fried turkeys with peanut oil but my girlfriend wants to try something a little healthier. So I purchased this and tried 2 butterball whole roaster chickens. Both tasted ok but skin wasn't crispy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamal

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE TURKEY FRYER!
customer_reviews.text: It's a FREAKING AWESOME piece of equipment! Easy to assemble and even easier to operate. 18lb bird took about 3 hours to cook. Heated up very quickly and came out amazing. I had nothing but a carcass left after dinner. Love the fact that it's oilless. Easy clean up and it tasted better than any bird I've ever fried in oil previously. Will be firing it up again this Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Lazarrick R.

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely happy with this device. Turkey frying in a super-clean way.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: but a awesome roaster. Let preheat for at least 30 minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: I will definitely use this throughout the year. I would not call it a oilless electric fryer, but a awesome roaster. Let preheat for at least 30 minutes before placing bird in roaster. Highly recommend this product and brining whole poultry for at least 8-12 hours using 1/2 cup brown sugar and 1/2 cup salt per gallon of water.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Roaster not Fryer
customer_reviews.text: I have been frying with oil for years and thought I would try something new this year. I decided to try it out prior to Thanksgiving and was glad I did. Although it is a solid well built unit the results are disappointing. It was very slow and eventually I had to move the bird into the oven to finish. If you are looking for an alternative to frying in oil this isn't it. This is a roaster no different than your oven other than it's portable. I think the hype and you tube ads comparing it to frying are misleading. I'm back to frying
customer_reviews.author: Paul F

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this item but use your own thermometer
customer_reviews.text: This cooker arrived yesterday, needing to do a test run before Thanksgiving I thought I would try some pork tenderloins, soaked the wood chips, mildly spiced the meat, brought it up to temperature and overcooked them because the thermometer never moved...Really wish I could give it 4.5, a couple of modifications and it would be a solid 5 stars. The temp adjuster should be in degrees, not warm, medium and hot, and found out the thermometer that is included is junk, not even close to being accurate...I would recommend this item but use your own thermometer...also a cookbook would be nice...I would even be willing to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: itsmyfirstday

customer_reviews.title: Super juicy and delicious Thanksgiving Turkey
customer_reviews.text: Excellent !!! better than an oil fryer. We used the Masterbuilt 20100809 Thanksgiving 2017, our turkey turned out super juicy and delicious, I will be using this again next year for sure. We are very happy with the results, I Honestly would have to say that I have never had such a juicy and delicious turkey using a conventional kitchen oven. This roaster freed up our oven to cook side dishes while out super delicious juicy bird was cooking in this roaster. Clean up was a breeze - easy, i sprayed the cooking basket with cooking spray" Olive oil cooking spray and after cooking the turkey it cleaned up very easily. " Just Buy It" you will love it
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: While this seems like a nice product
customer_reviews.text: While this seems like a nice product, it arrived with a broken piece. Masterbuilt customer service is reluctant to correct the error. I would not trust this manufacturer on other products. UPDATE - I have used this product 2 times. The outer shell is beginning to peel. While the turkey cooked fine, the product seems poorly built.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Iadicicco

customer_reviews.title: In use review here...
customer_reviews.text: I wish it coud hold larger turkeys (it does a good job with up to 16 pound birds). This might be a case of fat turkey discrimination on the part of the turkey cooking manafactures Illuminati. The turkey is tender and juicy. The skin is NOT CRISP LIKE A REAL FRYER, but it’s not soft like baking either. It’s a bit like a rotisserie chicken from Costco, but it’s better, because: turkey. And the cleanup is easier.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: The skin was nice and crispy - the inside moist and tasty
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after researching normal turkey fryer vs. an air fryer. Intrigued by the idea of not spending a fortune on oil every time we would want to cook a turkey, which is most major holidays and family functions., we decided to give this a try. Totally worth it! It cooks up to a 14lb turkey which sounds small but they only cook in 2 to 2 1/2 hours, so we were able to cook 2 turkeys for Thanksgiving in the time it would've taken 1 in the oven. The skin was nice and crispy - the inside moist and tasty. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: L. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Can use with other meats too
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the smoker once but I was really impressed with the results. I put approximately 5.5 lbs of chicken leg quarters in the smoker and the poultry was done by correct temperature in about 70 minutes. The inside of the chicken was so moist; The outer skin was crisp and the meat fell off the bone once I cut the skin. Also, I used hickory chips in the tray. I love it so far. I am eager to smoke a Boston Butt next. By the way, clean up was not a problem at all. I put the basket, grill insert and drip pan in my dishwasher. I highly recommend this cooker.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Stallworth

customer_reviews.title: One of the best "roasting devices" I've used
customer_reviews.text: One of the best "roasting devices" I've used. We have an oil based turkey fryer... hate the cleanup and waste (don't cook a lot of fried foods, leftover oil has spoiled twice before using again) and will most likely get rid of it. We brined the turkey... cooked it exactly as the included suggestions indicated... it was moist, flavorful, took less than 15 minutes cleanup. Lose the ability to actually stuff the turkey, so we just had "dressing". It was still great.
customer_reviews.author: Kickboxer

customer_reviews.title: No hardware
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this thing, to try it out for thanksgiving, but something told me to check it out before the big day. I opened the box and went though all the parts, then i noticed that is missing all of the hardware. When i called the manufacturer i got a voice mail because they were closed. Now in 59 years of being on this earth I've never ordered something and no nut and bolts were in the box. Thank God for home depot
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Moore

customer_reviews.title: Double thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: Does not give it a fried taste. Like others said, an oven will give you the same, or better results. However, another reason I purchased this was for its smoking option. Again, I was disappointed at the results. Using the smoking capability of this, or lack there of, is a total waste of time, and wood chips. All the smoke escapes the "fryer" or better description, the roaster, leaving you with not even a hint of smoke flavor. Very disappointed. Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.D.

customer_reviews.title: it takes good, but if you are wanting the crispy skin ...
customer_reviews.text: It roasts a turkey, it takes good, but if you are wanting the crispy skin and fried turkey taste... this is not the answer. It is safer, and due to not having to purchase $70 worth of peanut oil and propane, it is a cheaper alternative. Worked nicely and easy clean up. But it doesn't not give you the fried turkey taste.
customer_reviews.author: REVIEWER

customer_reviews.title: Good roaster/fryer
customer_reviews.text: Made a chicken for a test run and it came out Perfect. Cooked the Turkey on high like the video said and it came out perfect also. Skin was crispy and the breast was nice and moist. Need to be careful on where you place roaster for cooking because the heating element is on the bottom so where ever you put the the bottom gets very hot. The cold does effect the time it takes to cook and I have used it indoors for cooking both the chicken and the turkey. I started the chicken outside but because it was cold it was taking much longer to cook so we brought it inside to finish.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Ruley

customer_reviews.title: Not good at all. Going back to frying.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve always dried out turkeys and decided to try this out this year. It does not work. It took twice as long and they came out pale so we still had to put it in the oven for several hours. After that they didn’t taste good at all. Especially compared to the fried ones. Returned with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: margo

customer_reviews.title: The quality seems great, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to test it fully as a turkey roaster (as it is designed) as I got this as a Christmas gift and don't eat roast turkey every week. But I'll try a chicken. My friend has one and he says you can roast a lot of things, including french fries and other thin meats. The quality seems great, especially for the price. I got it for $69 from Prime (free shipping). You might need a separate thermometer with a thin probe that can be stuck through the vent tube hole in the top. The thermometer than comes with it is only for sensing internal meat temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: Takes forever to cook in this thing. Cant hold temputure
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to get this after reading all the reviews. Glad we did a test bird before Thanksgiving it took just over 2.5 hrs to cook a 7lb bird. The heating element world not start on. And yes I had the temputure Gage set to high. Food came out chewy because the temputure would not stay consistent or high enough. Returning it as some as I get it cleaned up. Junk!!! After I took it apart to send back after using once parts were already starting to rust.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: great hit. Everyone loved it
customer_reviews.text: Thanksgiving day, injected with butter and Cajun seasoning. Rubbed with same seasoning. Put the 15lb bird in for 2.5 hours on high as instructed with some wood chips in the tray and left it alone, great hit. Everyone loved it. The skin crisped up nicely and the meat was nice and juicy, subtle smoke flavor.
customer_reviews.author: MarineEngineer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Four stars for ease of use and convenience. Cooking my Thanksgiving turkey outdoors in this oil-free fryer freed up my single oven for other dishes. In that way, it was a wonderful help. The flavor of the bird was good; the turkey cooked in half the time it would have taken in my oven. My only complaint is that the skin wasn't more brown and crispy. This same complaint applied the next time I used the oil-free fryer to cook a roasting chicken. Still, it is a handy item I will be using again.
customer_reviews.author: TessHart

customer_reviews.title: Give it up !
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product would not get to heat on a 90° day I’m sure @ Thanksgiving outside it would never cook your turkey properly . Basically a bad portable oven .
customer_reviews.author: Seanster

customer_reviews.title: Awesome electric turkey roaster
customer_reviews.text: Cooked a 12 lbs turkey for T-day 2018 and this Masterbuilt Butterball Oil-Free Electric Turkey Fryer and Roaster did a nice job. Used the smoker box that gave the turkey a hint of smoke flavor. Bought a turkey brine kit from my local grocery store that helped keep the turkey very moist. Awesome electric turkey roaster for an alternative method to cook a T-day bird.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Palmer

customer_reviews.title: It just can’t give you the same thing as a deep fryer will
customer_reviews.text: Very convienent but you just can’t get the same crispness as a deep fryer. Still worth it from my point of view because of safety. It’s quiet large so storage is an issue. I think I will like it better for things other than turkey. I really like that you can adjust the temperature and that you can smoke meats with this.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tyrer

customer_reviews.title: It’s greaseless
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure that this would work but I am pleased with my greaseless turkey fryer, but I have had a problem registering it. I reached out to the company and I sent pictures there’s is not a serial number just model number. If you don’t care about the registration then ok, but if if fails..
customer_reviews.author: pastor694

customer_reviews.title: ... time hosting thanksgiving with no stress thanks to this wonderful thing. Got to sleep in
customer_reviews.text: Pulled off our first time hosting thanksgiving with no stress thanks to this wonderful thing. Got to sleep in, which of course stressed out my mother and got grandma concerned that we wouldn't eat in time, but the bird came out juicy and flavorful.
customer_reviews.author: Taye Arted

customer_reviews.title: Roaster, not an air fryer.
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line: the skin does not become crispy, as it does when a turkey is cooked in an oil fryer or a propane air fryer. It does a good job as a roaster, but it is not a fryer, contrary to the heading on Amazon's site. The box it came in and booklet clearly describe it as a roaster. The Amazon site also says "Double wall construction uses radiant heat to seal outside of turkey." Unlike a propane air fryer, where the walls become red hot, in this electric fryer all the radiant heat comes from the element below.
customer_reviews.author: Bawa

customer_reviews.title: Best turkey I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I have ever made. Cooks a turkey in about 10mins per pound of weight. Turkey turns out crispy on the outside and brown with the inside being tender and juicy. As with any appliance like this, the clean up is the worst part, but well worth it. Also, this product is not small, so storage is a bit of an inconvenience, however I love being able to cook my turkey separate from the oven, freeing the oven up for the other dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Castiglione Micro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Fryer, Performs as Promised
customer_reviews.text: I really like this fryer. It was easy to set up and does not take that long. I bought and brinned a free-range turkey. Brinned it for 12 hours. Preheated the fryer for 20 minutes and cooked the turkey at 10 mins per pound as described. Turkey browned nicely. For crisp skin make sure to wipe/dry the surface of the turkey. My first time to use this and my turkey was a total triumph. I highly recommend this fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Regg

customer_reviews.title: Good Alternative
customer_reviews.text: We've roasted one turkey so far and are very happy with it. Can't wait to try other items. Cleanup wasn't too bad and I didn't have 5-gallons of oil to worry about. The result was a very good turkey (we brined it overnight).
customer_reviews.author: GuruJon

customer_reviews.title: I am a terrible cook, hate cooking
customer_reviews.text: I am a terrible cook, hate cooking, hate even being in the kitchen, but this oil free deep fryer makes me seem like a professional! I can make the juiciest chicken, and the best turkey! LOVE IT! SOOOO easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing way to cook without oil.
customer_reviews.text: Oh...my...goodness!!! I can't tell you how well I love the new oil less turkey fryer. (Roaster) I didn't have a turkey but cooked a 5.5# chicken in 55 minutes. It was sooo tender and juicy. The meat literally fell off the bone. I even liked the juicy white meat. (To me white meat is never juicy) I highly recommend it especially if you are on a non-deep-fry diet. Clean up was even easy. Can't wait to try that turkey.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: no settings in numbers, screws difficult to put handles on
customer_reviews.text: No number setting on dial to figure out where medium heat is, not really happy with the dial and no numbers for heat settings? That way you have to experiment with cooking not a good way to operate! PLus the screws for handles were extremely hard to get not to cross thread.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Jacoby-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Oiless is "Just as good if not better " than deep fried
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together & just as easy to cook the turkey! Rubbing corn oil all over it helped to brown & crisp the skin. Tried it out a week before Thanksgiving at work first, for our annual Turkey Fryday; been deep frying turkeys with oil for years. Everyone agreed though, that it was just as good as our past deep fried turkeys, if not better. I couldn't argue. Cooked 2 turkeys on FriendsGiving with the same results all around!!! Check out the before & after pics!!! Btw- the supervisor from work ordered one from here on Amazon, that very same day he ate some turkey from the Masterbuilt oil-less deep fryer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does a turkey wonderfully but the chicken I tried did not come out ...
customer_reviews.text: Does a turkey wonderfully but the chicken I tried did not come out well at all.Fairly easy to clean up after cooking
customer_reviews.author: Mary W. Wheat

customer_reviews.title: WOW, perfect Turkey
customer_reviews.text: What a great roaster, received it in time for Thanksgiving, assembled it (very easy) and roasted a 14lb. turkey, took about 2 hours, came out very juicy, not very crispy, but just right. I used wood chips to give it a smokey flavor. One of the best turkeys I ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Donald H. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Better than I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could try to stay away from oil frying at Thanksgiving. It worked great. The skin was crispy and golden brown. There is a small pot below that catches all drippings that made gravy so easy. I have used it for roasting a ham and a prime rib and both were wonderful. It is so easy to use that I try to use this rather than my oven everytime I have something large enough to .
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. I read the reviews but need to try it for myself. I put a turkey in it to roast and also put a oven thermometer in the inside because there isn’t anyway to judge when it might be ready, there is just a dial with no temps on the outside. After having the turkey in the roaster for 2 hours the temperature on the highest the dial would go only was at 250. I took the turkey out and finished it in my oven. Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gallant

customer_reviews.title: Easiest cooking of a bird ever
customer_reviews.text: Just used this on Thanksgiving to cook a goose. I used the recommended cooking time per pound in the instruction manual and it was perfect. Everyone thought it turned out great. I will be trying some other cuts of meat in this soon. It was also very easy to clean afterward.
customer_reviews.author: JNW

customer_reviews.title: company needs too change to a metal lid as the ...
customer_reviews.text: company needs too change to a metal lid as the glass lid shatters when it gets hot and this has been happening to others as well as me according to their customer service representative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Roaster!
customer_reviews.text: Does the roasting job as well as a gas cooker. Its not a fryer, so don't expect results as if you had fried the turkey. The only way to achieve those results is by actually frying with oil. This is a roaster and its a great one. Its well built, feels strong, easy to assemble and to use. I had a lot of fun using it.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST addition to my home. Made the best turkey EVER! So easy to use and very easy to clean. I like easy!! The family loved the turkey. I also did a pot roast. Excellent roast! I put the potatoes and carrots in at the start with the meat and they were not cooked through when the meat was done in 3 hours. Next time I will cook the veggies in the microwave a little bit first and then add them to fryer/roaster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There were no leftovers to enjoy later! My guests ate it all
customer_reviews.text: After unintentionally serving raw turkey for the past 3 years due to a less than stellar oven, I bought this Oil-Free turkey fryer/smoke and served one of the most juicy and tasty turkeys in years. There were no leftovers to enjoy later! My guests ate it all. I consider that a success.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Chase

customer_reviews.title: The Masterbuilt Oil-Free fryer is AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: The Masterbuilt Oil-Free fryer is AWESOME!!!! No more expensive peanut oil purchases and it makes the turkey taste better!! It just takes a little longer to fry the "tom" but it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: BARRY A WEAKLEY

customer_reviews.title: Works great as long as you use a specific type of turkey.
customer_reviews.text: Does not cook a Butterball turkey correctly, it becomes very dry. I regular non-Butterball turkey turns out very well. The turkey was very tender and delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Sharon A. Mayhew

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Slow
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected but takes a very long time. I got the nicely cooked Turkey I wanted, but it took 4 to 5 hours. A fryer is a better alternative if you want it fast. I live in an apartment so it suits my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Veno M@dness

customer_reviews.title: they absolutely love it. We have one and people don't understand ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oil is fryer for my daughter and son-in-law for Christmas, they absolutely love it . We have one and people don't understand how you can deep fry a turkey in an oil is fryer. It is A safe way to deep fry a turkey without using oil and a money saver as well.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Dad, who loves deep frying turkeys. This turned out to be the most moist and delicious turkey he has ever made. Everyone loved it. It does take a little longer to cook using this method versus deep frying, but the results were well worth it! We loved it!
customer_reviews.author: polksentell

customer_reviews.title: Not Masterbuilts best effort.
customer_reviews.text: The turkey came out very juicy. I was not able to set the temperature because the control only has a color code on it, no temp. settings. Also, the unit was poorly designed and came with a cross threaded screw. This caused the plastic threaded "nut" in the base to strip and come loose. There was only 1 screw holding one of the on. It's being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: Several years ago, I purchased the Masterbuilt electric deep fryer in order to deep fry our Thanksgiving turkey. The results were phenomenal. We did 2 turkeys that year. One in the deep fryer and one in the oven. People fought over the deep fried bird. The only downside is the cost of the peanut oil and the cleanup afterward. So when I saw that Masterbuilt created an infrared fryer that required no oil, I was skeptical. But I gave it a try anyway. Amazing results. The bird was just as juicy and tender as the deep fried bird. And cleanup was a breeze. Masterbuilt hit a homerun with this one.
customer_reviews.author: William Anderson

customer_reviews.title: BEST APPLIANCE EVER!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS THING! Cooked a 15.5lb thanksgiving turkey in this for the holiday - took under 3 hours and was perfectly moist and delicious. We injected the turkey with creole butter and dropped it in, whole process was extremely easy. Fryer was easy to assemble, well made and designed. Drip pan caught plenty of drippings for gravy, and cleanup was fairly easy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: product was mostly good and as described
customer_reviews.text: product was mostly good and as described. I had an issue with a part and after 2nd attempt I was able to get the manufacturer to send a replacement part. Product is easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Love it, Thanksgiving turkey was fantastic. Very sturdy and every part looks and feels well made. The only thing was drippings from the turkey didn't drain into the drip cup and spilled all over when we took it from the bucket. Can't wait to try it out again
customer_reviews.author: Mark Canez

customer_reviews.title: works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, beats all the mess and danger of a oil fryer. Use a quality olive oil and inject your bird and everyone thinks you fried it. A lot easier. to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: TONY B.

customer_reviews.title: Great, healthy alternative for a turkey fryer.
customer_reviews.text: Great way to cook a turkey. Taste is good, not as great as peanut oil fryer. Used it in 30 degree weather. I like that it is healthy and cleanup was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Bondja

customer_reviews.title: The best turkey ever!
customer_reviews.text: Skip the oil friers, the turkey turns out better in this. No costly oil, no oil mess, no time consuming cleanup and allot more versatile. It does a fine job on roasts as well. We're now using it to make sandwich meat, roast beef, corn beef, turkey etc. The meat tastes a heck of allot better.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best turkey made in years. Wow what a great product. And not complicated at all.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dupote

customer_reviews.title: Decided I didn’t buy it to look pretty so I just kept it—dent and all
customer_reviews.text: Box was busted up and unit arrived on time with a dent in the side. Decided I didn’t buy it to look pretty so I just kept it—dent and all. Did my first turkey in it yesterday. So easy, and turned out so tasty. Easy enough to clean up. No need for gallons of oil or propane.
customer_reviews.author: Custom Woodworks

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Cooked evenly, crispy golden brown moist turkey in about 3 hours. Only issue, cleaning the basket is laborious and elbow grease is required to remove the stuck on turkey grease. Would have gave 5 stars, but the effort to clean the basket cost this my 5 star rating
customer_reviews.author: joe b.

customer_reviews.title: mixed reviews.  i'll probably buy the deep fryer that cooks in oil for next year.
customer_reviews.text: i dont plan on using it again. 't did great when i cooked a 12 lb. 'tester' chicken. crispy outside , juicy inside but, the 16 lb. turkey i made for thanksgiving was not cooked enough even though the thermometer read 'cooked' and the temp. on the cooker said it was too. it was inedible. luckily i baked another turkey in the oven that was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: tina s.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: I saw this at a big box but got a better price on Amaon. Turkey was great. One minor note is even with oil on the skin it does not brown quite like an oven turkey, however the turkey was moist and tasty! For ease of use and easy clean up it's well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: daddydot.mpeg

customer_reviews.title: And I am not a turkey lover but this machine made me look good!
customer_reviews.text: Without grease and open fires it cookes a turkey fast and it stays amazingly juicy! And I am not a turkey lover but this machine made me look good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This fryer works great! It gives your turkey a nice golden brown exterior but it's amazing how moist the meat stays. Customer service is great to work with too.We had to contact them on a small issue and they were quick to resolve it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie K

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this turkey fryer 2 yrs ago. It is awesome! I have cooked 12-18lb turkeys in it. Cooks a 14lb injected turkey in a little over 2 hrs. The skin comes out crisp and the meat is very juicy. I do make my own injection marinade for flavor. I have also cooked 15lb Boston Butt. I use the smoker box with various types of wood. Easy to clean. I bought the electric over the propane because I like the idea of being able to use the thermostat and can set the temp on low which is about 225-250 for slow smoking. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marie K. Bernard

customer_reviews.title: this thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: never cooked so many chickens and turkeys in my life. they come out perfect every time, and no grease or mess. also made 2 batches of beef jerky, perfect also.
customer_reviews.author: Dooode

customer_reviews.title: First turkey came out great..
customer_reviews.text: First turkey came out great...only con was the skin wasnt as crispy, but the pros out weigh the one con for me. Pros: No oil! No clean up! Juicy great tasting fried turkey! No propane! Con: Skin not as crispy
customer_reviews.author: Eric Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product use it all the time, nice not messing with the pricey oil
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L McClelland

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money if...
customer_reviews.text: If you have used a "real" turkey frier than this thing is not worth your time. No where as good as a real frier but if you have to go oil-less, do the infrared one. It does a pretty good job but what ever you do DONT USE THIS GARBAGE!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Huge fan of this almost fryer
customer_reviews.text: This probably won't deliver the fry super crispy skin you're expecting from a real oil fryer but it will deliver an incredibly juicy bird with skin better than in the oven. One of the best turkeys I've ever eaten, better than fried inside but skin not quite as crispy. Super easy to use, hope the heating element lasts based on other reviews but so far I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooker
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a Christmas turkey and the 38 people at the house loved it. Moist and juicy after just three hours of no nonsense cooking. Just make sure you keep a check on the drip pan as it will overflow on a large turkey, also make sure you give it at least an hour to get up to temperature. No oil no mess.
customer_reviews.author: HENRY EARL

customer_reviews.title: Looks a little like R2D2. Isn't as easy to store
customer_reviews.text: I had a butterball fryer before this. It kept blowing out outlets in my house. This does the same thing. Looks a little like R2D2. Isn't as easy to store, but works well
customer_reviews.author: Meg SS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Roaster!
customer_reviews.text: I am totally pleased with this unit. The Masterbuilt cooks uniformly and very easy to clean. The turkey comes out very moist throughout. I have officially retired my turkey fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Terrell Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice! Not only did my turkey cook super ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice! Not only did my turkey cook super fast, it was very moist and tender with virtually no clean-up. I recommended it to several friends already.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: We roasted two turkeys in one of these last weekend and continue to receive comments about how great they tasted. We used no seasonsing, but we did collect the juices and drizzle them over the turkey after slicing it. The flavor was wonderful. The turkeys were 15 pound Buttterballs, but we could have cooked much bigger ones in this roaster. We now have the problem of everyone wanting us to cook turkeys for them.
customer_reviews.author: Beth c.

customer_reviews.title: ... longer than what the instructions said but turned out great
customer_reviews.text: Took a lot longer than what the instructions said but turned out great
customer_reviews.author: MrsSmith

customer_reviews.title: Delicious results
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product! I will never make a turkey in the over again. I made a 15lb turkey in two hours. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: alessia

customer_reviews.title: consumer reports Turkey fryer best buy my ass
customer_reviews.text: tried ribs and chicken failed both turns out something is loose between connections. took forever and still had to waste meat
customer_reviews.author: W. J. Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a large whole chicken. Doesn't shorten the roasting time by much, but it came out great, nice crispy outside and juicy inside. Minimal mess.
customer_reviews.author: M. Skaggs

customer_reviews.title: Great cooker
customer_reviews.text: Best turkey we have ever had. Even more moist than deep fried.
customer_reviews.author: James W

customer_reviews.title: 5lb chicken the other day and it did great. The skin doesn't get as cooked as I ...
customer_reviews.text: We tested a 6.5lb chicken the other day and it did great. The skin doesn't get as cooked as I would like but I think I figured out how to make it brown better. Let you know after my first test getting ready for Thanksgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works as expected. We could fit a 20 lb turkey in it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Just trust the reviews on how well it works.
customer_reviews.text: Best turkey ever!! Thought I would come out like the turkey from Christmas Vacation, I was totally wrong! Best turkey I’ve ever had and the total cook time for a 13lb was just over 2 hours!
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting turkey ever!!
customer_reviews.text: The Masterbuilt Butterball oil free turkey fryer exceeded my expectations! The turkey cooked in this is far better than any deep fried turkey I have ever tasted. It does take longer to cook than a fryer but it is well worth the extra time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot less fuss and mess than my oil turkey ...
customer_reviews.text: A lot less fuss and mess than my oil turkey fryer. Guess I need to tend the wood chips a little closer as the smokey flavor was minimal. Well made product and cooks as stated. Have done a 15.5 and a 14.5 bird in a little over 2.5 hrs with no problem. If anything they were done earlier than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Lappa

customer_reviews.title: Hands Free Slow Cooking
customer_reviews.text: Have cooked a turkey, hen, pork ribs, and pork loin in the cooker. All were superb.
customer_reviews.author: Sunbird

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you use the THERMOMETER that comes with cooker.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Must have cooker.
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST TURKEY COOKER MADE. The turkey comes out perfect ever time. No brainer product. Outs.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Stenberg

customer_reviews.title: This cooker is excellent. The turkey came out better than a fried ...
customer_reviews.text: This cooker is excellent. The turkey came out better than a fried turkey, so juicy with crispy skin. We even tried a prime rib roast which also came out very tasty. It is easy to clean and while it's more difficult to store it does not really take up alot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Strgte54

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It works but is no better than cooking in the oven. In fact you can get the outside crisper in the oven. Results are no in no way like deal frying
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Ford

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: This Master built fryer is a must get. I've used it just once for thanksgiving and my 14.5 turkey came out real juicy. I couldn't believe how juicy it was. I recommend everyone who's thinking about purchasing a fryer this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: My first roaster and I LOVE IT! You can make anything you want in ...
customer_reviews.text: My first roaster and I LOVE IT! You can make anything you want in it! I’ve done sausage, turkey and chicken. There’s lots of options/recipes
customer_reviews.author: Megan Jaszkowiak

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete and Scant Information.
customer_reviews.text: The scant operational information provided made it difficult to obtaining the advertised results without contacting Master Built for more. I.E. need to preheat and rub of peanut oil to get dark color.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome. I recommend you preheat for one hour before ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. I recommend you preheat for one hour before putting in a turkey. Setup is easy and only requires a Phillips head screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie4Fngrs

customer_reviews.title: Great packaging. Will use again when need arises
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as advertised. Great packaging. Will use again when need arises. Recommended to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Magnum79

customer_reviews.title: Very good cooker, no oil
customer_reviews.text: Very good cooker, no oil! Not quite like oil frying, but makes very good turkey! Will try other food soon.
customer_reviews.author: John Brothers

customer_reviews.title: I liked everything about this fryer
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this fryer. The turkeys we cook, were very moist and tender. I was very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: I used my friend for Thanksgiving and it worked so great. I purchased one this week and it came used and I returned it for another and came new. If you don't have a smoker, this is the next best way to cook a Turkey. I'll be using this on Sunday for my church potluck.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great product for roasting turkeys.
customer_reviews.text: We received this before Thanksgiving and we have used it five times always with great results. We purchased an injector to at flavor and it works great with this machine. Never had a deep fried turkey but this electric roaster works great. We love it. Cleaning it is difficult due to the size if the tub the turkey sit in.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Knox

customer_reviews.title: I looked for solutions and this was the best I found
customer_reviews.text: We were doing Thanksgiving with friends, staying at an AirBnb. Ooops - I forgot to confirm that they had an oven. Kind of important for Thanksgiving to be able to cook the turkey. I looked for solutions and this was the best I found. To my surprise (and delight) it worked AMAZINGLY well. Really easy to setup, plug it in and it works. Used a brine overnight and we did some woodchips soaked in bourbon. Overall result was an awesome bird in 90 minutes with minimal hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

product_meta.title: Masterbuilt 20100809 Butterball Oil-Free Electric Turkey Fryer and Roaster
product_meta.description: Size:Information Not AvailableButterball's Oil Free Fryer/Roaster is one of the best performing, most convenient turkey fryers we've ever invented. A healthier, more convenient alternative to frying with oil, this electric turkey fryer and roaster offers foolproof operation and delicious results, whether gathering the family for thanksgiving dinner, pot-lucking with friends and neighbors, or simply making a variety of meals to freeze for later.
feature_bullets: Oil-free electric turkey fryer and roaster designed for healthy eating
Double-wall construction uses radiant heat to seal outside of turkey
Powerful 1,650-watt electric element cooks turkeys up to 18 pounds
Built-in wood chip box; removable drip pan at bottom of fryer
Measures 18 x 23.2 x 26.2 inches (W x H x D); 90-day limited warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars659 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
